snippet.title: Murder by Numbers | Special Animated Intro
snippet.description:
Meet Honor, SCOUT and the rest of the Murder By Numbers cast in this extra special animated intro!
Coming to Nintendo Switch very early 2020!  
 
You can wishlist on Steam right now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1140290/Murder_by_Numbers/
Published by The Irregular Corporation and Developed by Mediatonic.

Video Credits:
Studio Meala - https://studiomeala.com/
Director: Sean Cunningham
Producer:  Stephen Fagan
Storyboard Artists: Sinead O'Regan, Rebecca Reynolds
Animation:  Hardik Manktala, Sean Cunningham, Sinead O'Regan
Background Artist:  Sinead O'Regan
Compositing and Effects Artist: Olga Selma Egan

Song Credits:
HONOR'S THEME - VOCAL VERSION
Lyrics - Ed Fear
Composition - Masakazi Sugimori
Performance - Bright Light Bright Light
